description: Infocepts enables improved business results through more effective use of data, AI & user-friendly analytics. We partner with our clients to resolve the most common & complex challenges standing in their way of using data to strengthen business decisions.

updates.text: We’re excited to connect with data enthusiasts and industry leaders at the MicroStrategy Zurich Summit this week!

📢 Welcoming a Visionary Leader!

We’re thrilled to announce that Kumar Amitesh has joined Infocepts as our new President, based in New Jersey, USA!

Amitesh brings more than 2 decades of expertise in Data, Analytics, AI, Generative AI, and Cloud technologies, with a strong focus on driving business transformation. His extensive experience spans industries like Banking, Retail, Healthcare, and Life Sciences, where he has delivered impactful, AI & data-driven outcomes and led global strategies. 

Join us in welcoming Amitesh as he embarks on this exciting journey with us! 

🔗 Read the full announcement here: https://lnkd.in/gFGAEYKy

#Leadership #DataInnovation #AI #Infocepts

Thank you for joining us for the premiere episode of The Intelligent Leader podcast with Shashank Garg, featuring Pete Cherecwich of Northern Trust. 

Missed it? Watch Episode 1 here: https://lnkd.in/gz7J2iZ7. And don't forget to share your thoughts in the comments!

A huge thank you to Pete for sharing such valuable insights. The Intelligent Leader is now available on Spotify, Apple, and YouTube. Subscribe using the links below to stay updated on future episodes!

🔗 Apple: https://lnkd.in/ghc_hnPb
🔗 Spotify: https://lnkd.in/gEBfHuxn
🔗 YouTube: https://lnkd.in/g7_Kti-E

#TheIntelligentLeader #PodcastLaunch #DataAI #LeadershipInsights
The Intelligent Leader: Navigating Financial Risk with Data & AI #intelligentleader #podcast

Mental health begins at home—within ourselves, our teams, and our workplace culture. 
 
At Infocepts, we celebrated Mental Health Month in October, with a series of initiatives focused on mental well-being. From wellness workshops to interactive sessions, we came together to prioritize our mental health and build a supportive work environment.
 
Together, we’re creating a workplace where mental health is as important as physical health, and where everyone feels empowered to recharge and thrive. 
 
#MentalHealthMatters #WellBeingAtWork #StrongerTogether

⏳ The countdown has begun for the launch of 'The Intelligent Leader' podcast, hosted by our Founder & CEO, Shashank Garg!

Get ready for a deep dive into the world of data & AI with top business leaders and experts. From industry-changing strategies to real-world case studies, this podcast will give you the insights you need to lead with confidence. 🎬 Check out the trailer 👇  to get a sneak peek of what’s coming your way! 

Don’t miss the first episode, Register Now - https://lnkd.in/dKqFcwwR

Happy Diwali to all our clients, partners, and team members who make every day brighter! 🌟✨

Highlights from our Oct '24 Innovation Day are here! 👇

Each edition of Innovation Day has been a remarkable journey of learning, innovation, and meaningful connections. Reflecting on this fourth edition fills us with pride and excitement for what’s ahead. 

Thank you for being part of this incredible experience—we can’t wait to see you again in 📅 April 2025!

#InnovationDay2024 #InnovationHighlights #Infocepts #DataAIInnovation

We’re excited to announce the launch of our new podcast 'The Intelligent Leader', hosted by our Founder & CEO, Shashank Garg! 
 
Join us as we dive into engaging discussions with business leaders and data experts to share industry knowledge on new & innovative ways to use data & AI to enable business transformation.
 
Expect a mix of inspiration, fun, and valuable takeaways. Stay tuned for our first episode coming soon!
 
#IntentionalConversations #PodcastLaunch #ShashankGarg #IntelligentLeader #Infocepts
